psycModel 0.1.0

Center with respect to grand mean

center_grand_mean.Rd

Center all columns with respect to the grand mean

center_grand_mean(data, cols)

Arguments

data

dataframe
cols

vector or tidyselect syntax or helpers. column(s) that need to be centered. Recommend using where(is.numeric) to exclude changing factors.

Value

return a dataframe with the columns centered (replace existing columns)

Examples

center_grand_mean(iris,where(is.numeric))

#>     Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length   Petal.Width    Species
